Structs/AlertResult.html#/s:7Yamasee11Al.name: atMax
Structs/AlertResult.html#/s:7Yamasee11Al.abstract: Most severe turbulence item at current tile altitude.

Structs/AlertResult.html#/s:7Yamasee11Al.name: atMaxSev
Structs/AlertResult.html#/s:7Yamasee11Al.abstract: Max turbulence severity at current tile altitude.

Structs/AlertResult.html#/s:7Yamasee11Al.name: belowMax
Structs/AlertResult.html#/s:7Yamasee11Al.abstract: Most severe turbulence item below current tile altitude.

Structs/AlertResult.html#/s:7Yamasee11Al.name: belowMaxSev
Structs/AlertResult.html#/s:7Yamasee11Al.abstract: Max turbulence severity below current tile altitude.

Structs/AlertResult.html#/s:7Yamasee11Al.name: aboveMax
Structs/AlertResult.html#/s:7Yamasee11Al.abstract: Most severe turbulence item above current tile altitude.

Structs/AlertResult.html#/s:7Yamasee11Al.name: aboveMaxSev
Structs/AlertResult.html#/s:7Yamasee11Al.abstract: Max turbulence severity above current tile altitude.

Structs/AlertQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee10Ale.name: coordinate
Structs/AlertQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee10Ale.abstract: Current location coordinate. Can be nil when providing coordinates.

Structs/AlertQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee10Ale.name: timeSpan
Structs/AlertQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee10Ale.abstract: Number of minutes before current time for turbulence query (example 120)

Structs/AlertQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee10Ale.name: angleSpan
Structs/AlertQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee10Ale.abstract: Angle. Default = 15 degrees from velocity vector (i.e. 30 degrees).

Structs/AlertQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee10Ale.name: coordinates
Structs/AlertQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee10Ale.abstract: Set coordinates to search turbulence around them only. Coordinate will be translated into tile area and returned turbulence inside tile area that meets other query criterias. Use widthAround to set how far search from coordinates.

Structs/AlertQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee10Ale.name: widthAround
Structs/AlertQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee10Ale.abstract: Use only when coordinates is set. Determine how far from coordinates to search for turbulence.

Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.name: type
Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.abstract: Type of turbulence data - from server or own local.

Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.name: timeSpan
Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.abstract: How much time to query in past until now. In minutes.

Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.name: altRange
Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.abstract: Altitude lower and upper bounds of range. In feet.

Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.name: resultOptions
Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.abstract: Wheather to receive only as model items or as GeoJSON only, or receive both items and a GeoJSON.

Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.name: excludeTiles
Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.abstract: Using TurbulenceItem.tile.keyByCoord. For example to exclude own turbulence tiles from those received from the server. Default is empty.

Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.name: aggregate
Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.abstract: Aggregate turbulence by tile, so have only one most severe turbulence per tile. Default is true.

Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.name: coordinates
Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.abstract: Set coordinates to get turbulence around them only. For example to get turbulence along a route or by tapping on the map. Coordinate will be translated into tile area and returned turbulence inside tile area that meets other query criterias. Use widthAround to set how far search from coordinates.

Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.name: widthAround
Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.abstract: Use only when coordinates is set. Determine how far from coordinates to search for turbulence.

Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.name: tiles
Structs/TurbulenceQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee.abstract: Using TurbulenceItem.tile.keyByCoord to get turbulence in these tiles only.

Structs/TilesBeamQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee1.name: coordinate
Structs/TilesBeamQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee1.abstract: Coordinate of a plane to start querying tiles in a “beam area” from.

Structs/TilesBeamQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee1.name: heading
Structs/TilesBeamQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee1.abstract: Heading in which the plane in moving to.

Structs/TilesBeamQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee1.name: angleSpan
Structs/TilesBeamQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee1.abstract: Angle span of a “beam” to query tiles in a “beam area” ahead in heading for distance. Use to have a natural light beam instead of using widthAround.

Structs/TilesBeamQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee1.name: widthAround
Structs/TilesBeamQuery.html#/s:7Yamasee1.abstract: Use to have a straight line beam instead of using angleSpan.

Structs/TilesBeamQuery.html.name: TilesBeamQuery
Structs/TilesBeamQuery.html.abstract: Tiles query configuration for a “beam area” ahead the plane.

Structs/TurbulenceResultOptions.html.name: TurbulenceResultOptions
Structs/TurbulenceResultOptions.html.abstract: Control how you would like to receive queried turbulence result.

Structs/Flight.html.name: Flight
Structs/Flight.html.abstract: Flight info to be associated with reports and events.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: newTurbulenceData(serverUpdateTime:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Called every time a new turbulence data arrives from the server.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: newTrafficData(serverUpdateTime:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Called every time a new traffic data arrives from the server.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: deviceAngleStatusChanged(isInAngle:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Called when a device angle status changed.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: turbulenceDetected(newTurbulence:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Called when the algorithem detected new turbulence event or when a tile is declared as “turbulence clean”.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: loginStatus(isLoggedIn:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Called when there is a change in the framework login status. also called on framework start to notify last login status (i.e. if login session is valid).

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: airborneStatus(isAirborne:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Called when there is a change in the framework airborne status.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: locationUpdated(to:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Called when the SDK updated current location.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: locationManagerDidChangeAuthorization(status:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: When the authorization status for location usage is changed.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: locationManagerDidFail(withError:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Location manager did fail to get a location.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: ownTurbulenceChanged()
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Called whenever there is a change to the local turbulence data (the algorithem detected new turbulence event or when a tile is declared as “turbulence clean” ALSO when the data was successfully delivered to the server).

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: newWeatherData(serverUpdateTime:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Called every time a new weather data arrives from the server.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: ownWeatherChanged()
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Called every time a new weather data was reported by the user.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: newAirportsData()
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Called every time the airports data is updated.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: serverReachabilityUpdate(isReachable:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Called when Yamasee server became reachable or unreachable probably to no internet connection.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: newDataFetchingFailed(with:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: SDK failed to get a new data. Could be due to no connection, server not reachable or any other.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: newAlert(_:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Notify when found a new alert when in auto monitoring mode started by startMonitoringAlerts(with:).

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.name: didReportWeather(_:)
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html#/s:7Y.abstract: Notify that a new weather has been reported.

Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html.name: YamaseeCoreDelegate
Protocols/YamaseeCoreDelegate.html.abstract: The methods that you use to receive events from associated events in YamaseeLib.

Enums/YMLocationState.html#/s:7Yamasee15.name: good
Enums/YMLocationState.html#/s:7Yamasee15.abstract: based on the actual data received from the device

Enums/YMLocationState.html#/s:7Yamasee15.name: dr
Enums/YMLocationState.html#/s:7Yamasee15.abstract: extrapolated from the previous location and speed

Enums/YMLocationState.html#/s:7Yamasee15.name: externalDr
Enums/YMLocationState.html#/s:7Yamasee15.abstract: extrapolated from the previous external location and speed

Enums/QueryError.html#/s:7Yamasee10Query.name: altitudeRangeNotRoundToThousandFeet
Enums/QueryError.html#/s:7Yamasee10Query.abstract: Altitude range should be rounded to thousand feet. For example, 38000-40000 feet is correct, 38000-40100 or 38100-40000 are wrong.

Enums/PartnerLoginError.html#/s:7Yamasee.name: userIdOrCompanyIdInvalid
Enums/PartnerLoginError.html#/s:7Yamasee.abstract: user id or company id is empty or invalid

Enums/LoginError.html#/s:7Yamasee10Login.name: userIdOrPasswordInvalid
Enums/LoginError.html#/s:7Yamasee10Login.abstract: user id or password are not valid

Enums/LoginError.html#/s:7Yamasee10Login.name: userLocked(message:)
Enums/LoginError.html#/s:7Yamasee10Login.abstract: user is locked for some time due to many failed login attempts

Enums/LoginError.html#/s:7Yamasee10Login.name: ssoInvalid
Enums/LoginError.html#/s:7Yamasee10Login.abstract: airline sso is not supported or invalid

Enums/LoginError.html#/s:7Yamasee10Login.name: ssoDisabledInPublic
Enums/LoginError.html#/s:7Yamasee10Login.abstract: airline sso is disabled in public app version

Enums/LoginError.html#/s:7Yamasee10Login.name: weakPassword
Enums/LoginError.html#/s:7Yamasee10Login.abstract: during setting a new password if password is not strong enough

Enums/GeneralError.html#/s:7Yamasee12Gen.name: tooManyRequests
Enums/GeneralError.html#/s:7Yamasee12Gen.abstract: when trying to call same endpoint too many times and requests are restricted for some time

Enums/GeneralError.html#/s:7Yamasee12Gen.name: upgradeRequired(message:)
Enums/GeneralError.html#/s:7Yamasee12Gen.abstract: sdk or app version is not supported, upgrade is required

Enums/ForgotPasswordError.html#/s:7Yamas.name: userIdInvalid
Enums/ForgotPasswordError.html#/s:7Yamas.abstract: user id parameter is empty or invalid

Enums/DataMode.html#/s:7Yamasee8DataMode.name: writeOnly
Enums/DataMode.html#/s:7Yamasee8DataMode.abstract: Do not receive data, only track and send data

Enums/TurbulenceResultType.html#/s:7Yama.name: server
Enums/TurbulenceResultType.html#/s:7Yama.abstract: Received from the server, aggregated based on multiple reports and per current airplane type set.

Enums/TurbulenceResultType.html.name: TurbulenceResultType
Enums/TurbulenceResultType.html.abstract: SDK has own tracked on current device turbulence and received from the server reported by other devices (including from current device that has been sent to the server already).

Enums/AlertResultType.html.name: AlertResultType
Enums/AlertResultType.html.abstract: Type of alerts search - along route coordinates or in a beam mode.

Enums/DataHistoryTime.html.name: DataHistoryTime
Enums/DataHistoryTime.html.abstract: On start SDK receives an initial history data and then periodically receives only updates since the last update. Server does some data precalculations so only the specified time frames are supported. Measured in hours.

Enums/DataMode.html.name: DataMode
Enums/DataMode.html.abstract: To save network traffic SDK allows to set different working modes like writeOnly when SDK will not fetch new data from the server periodically. It can be useful when pilot is not on the map right now or SkyPath turbulence layer is turned off etc.

Enums/Environment.html.name: Environment
Enums/Environment.html.abstract: Server environment used by SDK internal API routing

Enums/AlertError.html.name: AlertError
Enums/AlertError.html.abstract: Errors returned when making a data query

Enums/QueryError.html.name: QueryError
Enums/QueryError.html.abstract: Errors returned when making a data query

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: logout()
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Logout from Yamasee server. Stops all communication with Yamasee server. Turbulence collection stop. Cached turbulence data is deleted.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: user
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Logged in user details. Nill when not logged in.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: tilesInBeam(with:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Get tiles ids array as a Tile.keyByCoord string to pass then in a TurbulenceQuery.tiles or where needed.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: getOwnTurbulenceGeoJson(altRange:timeSpan:zoomLevel:aggregate:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Get turbulence tracked by the current device

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: getOwnTurbulence(altRange:timeSpan:zoomLevel:aggregate:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Get turbulence tracked by the current device

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: turbulence(inTile:altRange:timeSpan:own:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Get all turbuence in a specific tile only

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: dataUpdatedAt
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Last date when successfully received new data

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: fetchData()
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: In case you need to get new data immediately (for example when opened the app) call this method and the result will be notified in corresponding delegate methods.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: dataMode
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: In case you need to disable some features of the SDK, you can set different working mode. For example, to save network traffic, you can set Yamasee.shared.dataMode = .writeOnly to disable periodic new data fetch from the server.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: dataHistoryTime
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Set history time to receive data for in an initial data request made on start.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: getWeather(types:altRange:timeSpan:zoomLevel:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Get weather for a list of types

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: getWeather(types:altRange:timeSpan:zoomLevel:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Get weather for a list of types

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: getOwnWeather(types:altRange:timeSpan:zoomLevel:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Get Own weather for a list of types

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: getOwnWeather(types:altRange:timeSpan:zoomLevel:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Get Own weather for a list of types

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: getRouteAlerts(route:widthAround:altitude:timeSpan:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Get Alerts Tiles on a selected route

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: alertedTurbulenceSeverity(_:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Call when the turbulence alert was presented to the user in the app

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: startMonitoringAlerts(with:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Start monitoring alerts with a query in an automatic mode. Alerts will be searched on location updates. Alerts will be notified via a delegate method newAlert(_:).

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: stopMonitoringAlerts()
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Stop monitoring alerts in an automatic mode.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: getAircraft()
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Gets the current aircraft type registered in the framework

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: nearestAirports(to:count:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Get nearest airports to a given location.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: nearestAirports(to:count:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Get nearest airports to a given location.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: setAngle()
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Set angle of device in a cradle

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: resetAngle()
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Reset angle of device in a cradle to zero to start position from scratch

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: isInPosition()
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Checks if device is in proper positioned in cradle

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: isCurrentPositionSteady()
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Checks if current device angle wasn’t significantly changed during last few seconds to identify position as a steady position

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: startFlight(_:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Start a new flight. Does the same as setFlight(_:), so use one of them. startFlight(_:) and endFlight() are preferred.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: endFlight()
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Stop current flight if any was set by startFlight(_:) or setFlight(_:). Does the same as setFlight(_:) with nil, so use one of them. startFlight(_:) and endFlight() are preferred.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: setFlight(_:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Set a new flight when started or nil when when finished. For better clarity in the code calling startFlight(_:) and endFlight() are preferred instead of setFlight(_:).

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: flightPhase
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Get current assumed flight phase based on current location and how it’s changed for the last time.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: airborne
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: If current location is determined as airborne - when altitude is above 10k feet

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: acknowledgeTerms()
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Write event that pilot accepted terms of use

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: askBeforeRequestingLocationAuthorizationBlock
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: When need to show an info screen explaining why location is needed to prevent SDK immediately ask for location permission

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: setSimulatorMode(isLocationSimulatorOn:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Allows client to suply degug location for the framework

Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.name: setPushSimulatedEnabled(_:)
Classes/YamaseeCore.html#/s:7Yamasee0A4C.abstract: Restrict sending on the server tracked turbulence and reported weather

Classes/YMLocalNotificationManager.html#.name: checkNotificationSettings(completion:)
Classes/YMLocalNotificationManager.html#.abstract: Check current notifications usage permission. Will be auto requested if status is notDetermined.

Classes/YMLocalNotificationManager.html#.name: scheduleNotification(title:body:sound:contentCategoryIdentifier:)
Classes/YMLocalNotificationManager.html#.abstract: Schedule a local notification to be shown immediately.

Classes/YMLogger.html#/s:7Yamasee8YMLogg.name: rollingFrequency
Classes/YMLogger.html#/s:7Yamasee8YMLogg.abstract: Set frequency for creating a new log file. Default is 1 week.

Classes/YMLogger.html#/s:7Yamasee8YMLogg.name: maximumNumberOfLogFiles
Classes/YMLogger.html#/s:7Yamasee8YMLogg.abstract: Set maximum number of log files stored to optimize storage. Each file contains logs per time specified in rollingFrequency.

Classes/YMLogger.html#/s:7Yamasee8YMLogg.name: logFileUrls()
Classes/YMLogger.html#/s:7Yamasee8YMLogg.abstract: Log files urls to export for debug.

Classes/YMLogger.html.name: YMLogger
Classes/YMLogger.html.abstract: Logger that logs network, errors, warnings and other info that can be later used to debug.

Classes/YMLocalNotificationManager.html.name: YMLocalNotificationManager
Classes/YMLocalNotificationManager.html.abstract: Helper for showing a local notifications. For example for a turbulence alert when the app is in the background.

Classes/YamaseeCore.html.name: YamaseeCore
Classes/YamaseeCore.html.abstract: A wrapper class handling all communications between host app and internal SkyPath logic.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
